A

AbstractMenu - Class in io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu
A base class to create menus, it also provides utilities methods to perform I/O.
AbstractMenu() - Constructor for class io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.AbstractMenu
Constructs an abstract menu.
askForDouble(String) - Method in class io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.AbstractMenu
A helper method to display a message and return a double from keyboard.
askForInt(String) - Method in class io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.AbstractMenu
A helper method to display a message and return an integer from keyboard.
askForPhrase(String) - Method in class io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.AbstractMenu
A helper method to display a message and return a line from the keyboard.
askForWord(String) - Method in class io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.AbstractMenu
A helper method to display a message and return a word from the keyboard.

chooseOptionMessage() - Element in annotation interface io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.Configuration

Clear the terminal output.
clearTerminalAutomatically() - Element in annotation interface io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.Configuration
If the terminal should be cleared automatically after an option is chose and executed.
Configuration - Annotation Interface in io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu
An annotation to add configurations to a menu.

format() - Element in annotation interface io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.Configuration

I

invalidDoubleMessage() - Element in annotation interface io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.Configuration

invalidOptionMessage() - Element in annotation interface io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.Configuration

io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu - package io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu
